dcterms:subject: a written pledge
schema:personRoleB: Fatima Bibi b. Khuda Berdi Akhun
schema:abstract: Tunisa Khan b. Baha ud-Din Akhund from Torabagh of [Kashghar Old] City, describes on her inherited property from her father; a house with one room locates in , which currently inhabits by her mother Fatima Bibi b. Khuda Berdi Akhun. In this contract Tunisa Khan promises that she does not charge the rent until the time of her death, and take over the house after then.
schema:grant: <KAKENHI> 研究費 (Japan Society for the Promotion of Science)
